# radiusFormat

**Instance Property**

The format of each radius in the radius buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var radiusFormat: MTLAttributeFormat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The property’s default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAttributeFormat/float].
